      • AddSpectrum

        public AddSpectrum(java.nio.file.Path anaFile,
                   java.nio.file.Path txtFile,
                   java.nio.file.Path cvtFile,
                   java.nio.file.Path flsFile,
                   java.nio.file.Path conversionTable,
                   java.lang.String sheet,
                   equinoxServer.remote.data.SpectrumInfo info)
        Creates add spectrum task for adding individual CDF set files.
        Parameters:
        anaFile - Path to ANA file.
        txtFile - Path to TXT file. Can be null.
        cvtFile - Path to CVT file.
        flsFile - Path to FLS file.
        conversionTable - Path to conversion table.
        sheet - Selected conversion table sheet.
        info - Spectrum info (can be null).
